name: Zoo Mobile
description:
Zoo Mobile – Open your own Zoo!
Majestic lions, fluffy bunnies and curious kangaroos – in Zoo Mobile, you'll meet them all as you experience the colorful tycoon sensation and run your own zoo!

Create the Zoo of your Dreams!
Build enclosures, keep all sorts of animals and provide them with tender loving care. The happier your animals are, the more visitors will come to your zoo.

Discover an extraordinary app that will captivate you with vibrant animal game features and a wide variety of zoo game options. Decorate to your heart's content and complete everyday tasks and exciting challenges, from caring for animals to breeding endangered animals. Zoo Mobile is jam-packed with fun features for animal lovers:

• A wide variety of stunning exotic animals
• Adorable animations and cute cartoon graphics
• Entertaining social gaming features
• Create animal game habitats and surroundings
• Regular updates and zoo game events
• Game features that allow you to care for animals and breed animals
• A back story and quest missions that are sure to draw you in
• Long-lasting fun in a gorgeous tycoon setting

The Animal Game Adventure Begins
Become a zoo director today and establish your own zoo. Decorate the walkways with unique zoo game items – from snack stands over restrooms to toy shops!

Download the Animal Game App!
Prove your skill as a zoo manager, take care of adorable animals and turn your zoo into an awesome attraction. Explore the animal game adventure that is Zoo Mobile.

Play now and dive into a one-of-a-kind zoo game experience!

Note: Zoo Mobile is a standalone app and cannot be linked to existing accounts in the eponymous browser game.
